Yafei Ou
Yafei Ou

Bio

I am now a Postdoctoral Researcher at Research Center For Integrated Quantum Electronics, Hokkaido University, hosted by Prof. Masayuki Ikebe. I got my Ph.D. degree from Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, Hokkaido University.

My main interests are in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Medical Image Analysis. Specifically in Tone Mapping, Image Registration, and Image Segmentation.
